titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Alice Ambrose, 17. 2. 1937
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: I am ashamed not to have sent you a card at Christmas. You were on my list of people to whome I intended to write but somehow you were forgotten. A few days ago your card arrived here & I was pleased to get it. So take my best wishes for the New Year although a bit of it has already passed. I've been living in Norway since last August, but I've been home & in England round about Christmas. I hope your work is going well & I hope you have forgiven me for inflicting pain upon you while you were in Cambridge.
